Anger.description: Deal 6(8) damage. Add a copy of this card to your discard pile.

Armaments.description: Gain 5 Block. Upgrade a(ALL) card(s) in your hand for the rest of combat.

BodySlam.description: Deal damage equal to your current Block.

Clash.description: Can only be played if every card in your hand is an Attack. Deal 14(18) damage.

Havoc.description: Play the top card of your draw pile and Exhaust it.

Headbutt.description: Deal 9(12) damage. Place a card from your discard pile on top of your draw pile.

HeavyBlade.description: Deal 14 damage. Strength affects Heavy Blade 3(5) times.

PerfectedStrike.description: Deal 6 damage. Deals an additional 2(3) damage for ALL of your cards containing Strike.

SwordBoomerang.description: Deal 3 damage to a random enemy 3(4) times.

Thunderclap.description: Deal 4(7) damage and apply 1 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

TrueGrit.description: Gain 7(9) Block. Exhaust a random(not random) card from your hand.
